column1: There are more trees around the way.
Yes, it seems that our sight has been blocked.
You have to look out for them.
Come on, I'm not afraid of the bugs…
A human? How could a human come to these faraway woods?
A youkai? Do you want to stop us?
We're here to investigate the meteor fragments.
Indeed, I can feel a powerful magic source coming from these fragments.
For humans, it's not a good thing.
Then, do you know who summoned all these shooting stars?
Are you trying to snatch away all these meteor fragments?
Go away before I get mad!
started to become so arrogant towards youkai.
It seems I'll have to make you understand
